results.title: Metformin Reduces the Risk of Total Hip Arthroplasty in Elderly Patients with Hip Osteoarthritis and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
results.text_hl: However, the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis_Hip</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015207 @@@hip osteoarthritis@@@ is rarely reported.
